_comment: Non-sensitive settings. API credentials should be in .env file.

polling._comment: How often to refresh data (in milliseconds). 3600000 = 1 hour

alerts._comment: Threshold percentages for alerts. Set to null to disable.

account._comment: Optional: Your total net deposits (deposits - withdrawals) in GBP. If specified, P/L will be calculated as: (Total Value - Total Deposits). This matches the Trading 212 app's P/L calculation. If not specified, uses API's invested amount (cost basis of current positions only).
